Articles.Content:
True. I'm a G.I.R.L (Guy In Real Life)

The user below me is a shemale.

False.

The user below me is a purist.

False, See: "The ****-ton of mods Chobit has crammed into Skyrim", an Epic Prose Edda by Chobit

The user below me has left their PC on for days to download huge files

True, my game updates take ages

The user below me has played KSP all weekend nonstop.

True. 526 movies, and 1109 music files. Don't ask.

Edit:Sniped. True, every weekend.

The user below me is not a female.

Edited May 8, 2013 by Rockcoole

True.

The next user is female.

False.

The guy after me needs to shave.

True, but only the moustache.

The user below me hasn't eaten for 10 hours, too much KSP and forums.

False. I'm eating while playing and doing forums.

The user below me spends more time in forums than in the game itself.

Had to answer this, defiantly Its more interesting to look at the forums than to play the game now.

The user below me has the exact same problem.

True... Derp

The user below me doesn't have this problem.

False.

The user below me has launched a bottlerocket.

False

The user below me is Asian

False.

The user below me is a squid.

False. A socialistic wolf.

The user below me likes SPACE!
The user below me plays with himself.

False,

The user below me spends more time on the off topic forums than the on topic forums

True. Off Topic=Fun

The user below me lives in the year 1146.

True.

The user below me is allergic to cats.

False, cant be, I would be sneezing all the time, my cats somehow get their fur all over my clothes

The user below me has 10 pets

Deathly so, in fact.

Ohlooksniped. False. I have one, and it's a very pretty dog.

The person below me agrees with me when I say that cats are the most evil and vile creatures imaginable, barring fans of various boy bands.

False

The person below me is sitting down

True, how else would you use a computer?

The user below me shall be sniped by another person (paradox much?)

Whut.

The user below me understands what he said...

Its simple, its a paradox.

The answer must be false as sniping would mean that they are not the person below me and the sniper is not sniped so they have to put false.
